title: In 'horrifying and amazing' video, a giant tortoise attacks and devours baby bird
content:
1. In 'horrifying and amazing' video, a giant tortoise attacks and devours baby bird  The Hill
  2. 'Totally Surprising and Rather Horrifying': Giant Tortoises Eat Baby Birds  Yahoo! Voices
  3. Giant tortoise kills and eats baby bird  Guardian News
  4. Giant tortoise seen attacking and eating baby bird for first time in the wild in 'horrifying' incident  CNN
  5. First video evidence of tortoises hunting birds / Curr. Biol., Aug. 23, 2021 (Vol. 31, Issue 16)  Cell Press
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: ゾッとするような素晴らしい映像で、巨大なカメが赤ちゃんの鳥を襲って食べています。
在 "可怕和惊人 "的视频中，一只巨型乌龟袭击并吞噬了小鸟
在 "可怕和驚人 "的視頻中，一隻巨型烏龜襲擊併吞噬了小鳥
